(What tail? he's in bot mode.)
The white and grey bot passed the branch where Shadow Wing once 
perched, she obviously was no longer on the tree. He hadn't reacted 
fast enough. 

Knowing he was vulnerable he swiftly rebounded off the tree toward 
the cave. he heard the rock hit behind him. With the swift grace of 
the animal he was patterned after he leapt up the rock facing outside 
the cave and leapt toward the first movement he saw flying in the air.

"She's toying with me. these are supposed to be physical sparring 
matches and she's treating this like it's a game." His thoughts went 
through his head almost as fast as his reactions went through his 
body. He wouldn't let Shadow Wing  laugh through this.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
>  The tree started to sway and give way as Lunarpine slashed at it's 
> base.  She opened her wings and flapped them to maintain balance.  
> She felt a strong breeze pick up and she took to the wind.  She 
> hovered above Lunarpine and the tree fell down.  She stayed at the 
> same height as the tree branch was before the tree fell.  She 
pulled 
> out a rock from ehr sachel, took it into her beak and dropped it 
> again aiming for his tail this time.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Luckily Lunarpine stepped forward so the stone hit him in the 
back 
> > instead of the head.He didn't smell any nuts or seeds so he only 
> had 
> > one conclusion "Maximize", he shouted as he transformed, turned 
and 
> > slashed the base of the tree causeing it to tumble forward. as it 
> > fell he jumped up the side toward Shadow Wings scent. he knew he 
> had 
> > to move fast so she couldn't fly off.
> >
